Headline: Friction Hunter | FinOps & AI Strategist | $220M+ Recovered via Automation | CloudFix
Summary: I find and fix technical and commercial friction at scale. At CloudFix, I help large orgs quietly recover millions by automating AWS cost savings. I’ve co-founded AI platforms, led enterprise software sales, and optimized $1.2B+ in cloud spend. My strength is building invisible systems that drive visible impact—turning inefficiency into EBITDA.  I thrive at the intersection of FinOps, automation, and strategic sales. Let’s connect if you’re scaling cloud savings, building cost-aware products, or want to operationalize AI ROI.
